whoWeAre.title: Who we are
whoWeAre.subtitle: Oneir (from the Greek Oneirus, "interpreter of dreams") is more than our name.

howWeWork.intro: Our process begins with listening. We take time to understand your goals, challenges, and opportunities.
howWeWork.description: From there, we shape ERP solutions that do more than solve problems. They unlock value across operations, finance, and growth.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description:
Our mission is to partner with businesses, understand their vision, and provide ERP and accounting solutions that make that vision real.

For over 25 years, Oneir has supported industries from building supply to food manufacturing, from distribution to retail. One truth has always held: every client's vision is unique.

items.title: Discovery-First Approach
items.description: We start by understanding what matters most to your business, uncovering challenges and opportunities together.

items.title: Precision & Reliability
items.description: With decades of experience, we deliver solutions built on efficiency, accuracy, and results you can trust.

items.title: Industry Expertise
items.description: From wholesale to manufacturing, retail to construction—we understand the unique needs of your industry.

items.title: Innovation & Future-Ready
items.description: We build solutions with AI readiness and modern technology, ensuring your business stays ahead.

items.title: Partnership & Support
items.description: We're not just a vendor—we're your partner in growth, providing ongoing training and support.

why.title: Why Choose Oneir
why.description: We combine deep industry knowledge with cutting-edge technology to deliver ERP solutions that don't just meet your needs today—but grow with your business tomorrow. Our proven track record spans over two decades, serving diverse industries with customized solutions that drive real business results.

cta.title: Ready to Transform Your Business?
cta.description: Let's start with discovery. Together, we'll uncover what matters most to your business and build a solution that works.
